subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following Rajasthani kingdoms did not exist during the medieval period?
question_hi: मध्यभवनों में कौन से राजस्थानी राजधानियों में मध्यभवन क्या राजधानी के साथ नहीं हुए एक डेवली शासन के साथीं नहीं हुए।
answer_notes: Amber was a Rajput kingdom which did not exist alongside the Delhi Sultanate.
